About.about_text: Our application is a prototype of the well-known 'Wheel of Life Balance' exercise. In this web application, you evaluate your areas of life with the help of points
About.multiU_text: You can use the application from different accounts
About.resultI_text: Our application will immediately show you the result of your expenses in the form of a balance wheel
About.savingA_text: For convenience, your balance wheel is automatically saved in the new app
About.languageC_text: Our application works in English and Ukrainian, so that everyone can use our application

Calendar.error: You should type only positive numbers :)
